verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt love the LORD thy God, and keep his charge, and his statutes, and his judgments, and his commandments, alway.
verses.ct: So you must love the LORD your God and always obey his requirements, his laws, his regulations, and his commands.

verses.kjv: And know ye this day: for I speak not with your children which have not known, and which have not seen the chastisement of the LORD your God, his greatness, his mighty hand, and his stretched out arm,
verses.ct: Recognize today that I'm not speaking to your children, who didn't experience or witness the discipline of the LORD your God, his greatness, his powerful hand, and his outstretched arm.

verses.kjv: And his miracles, and his acts, which he did in the midst of Egypt unto Pharaoh the king of Egypt, and unto all his land;
verses.ct: They didn't see his miracles and the things he did in the middle of Egypt to Pharaoh, the king of Egypt, and to his entire country.

verses.kjv: And what he did unto the army of Egypt, unto their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the water of the Red sea to overflow them as they pursued after you, and how the LORD hath destroyed them unto this day;
verses.ct: They didn't see what he did to the Egyptian army, their horses, and their chariots — how he caused the waters of the Red Sea to rush over them as they chased you, and how the LORD wiped them out completely, as it remains to this day.

verses.kjv: And what he did unto you in the wilderness, until ye came into this place;
verses.ct: They didn't see what he did for you in the wilderness until you arrived at this place.

verses.kjv: And what he did unto Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, the son of Reuben: how the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their households, and their tents, and all the substance that was in their possession, in the midst of all Israel:
verses.ct: They didn't see what he did to Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab and descendants of Reuben — how the ground split open and swallowed them, along with their families, their tents, and every living thing that belonged to them, right in front of all Israel.

verses.kjv: But your eyes have seen all the great acts of the LORD which he did.
verses.ct: But you yourselves have witnessed all the mighty things the LORD has done.

verses.kjv: Therefore shall ye keep all the commandments which I command you this day, that ye may be strong, and go in and possess the land, whither ye go to possess it;
verses.ct: So obey every command I'm giving you today, so that you will be strong enough to enter and take possession of the land you are crossing over to claim.

verses.kjv: And that ye may prolong your days in the land, which the LORD sware unto your fathers to give unto them and to their seed, a land that floweth with milk and honey.
verses.ct: Then you will live long in the land that the LORD promised to your ancestors and their descendants — a land rich with milk and honey.

verses.kjv: For the land, whither thou goest in to possess it, is not as the land of Egypt, from whence ye came out, where thou sowedst thy seed, and wateredst it with thy foot, as a garden of herbs:
verses.ct: The land you are entering to possess is not like Egypt, where you came from. There you planted your seeds and irrigated by foot, like watering a vegetable garden.

verses.kjv: But the land, whither ye go to possess it, is a land of hills and valleys, and drinketh water of the rain of heaven:
verses.ct: Instead, the land you are crossing over to possess is a land of hills and valleys that receives its water from the rain of heaven.

verses.kjv: A land which the LORD thy God careth for: the eyes of the LORD thy God are always upon it, from the beginning of the year even unto the end of the year.
verses.ct: It is a land that the LORD your God personally watches over. The LORD your God keeps his attention on it constantly, from the start of the year to the end.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken diligently unto my commandments which I command you this day, to love the LORD your God, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul,
verses.ct: If you carefully obey the commands I am giving you today — to love the LORD your God and serve him with your whole heart and your whole soul —

verses.kjv: That I will give you the rain of your land in his due season, the first rain and the latter rain, that thou mayest gather in thy corn, and thy wine, and thine oil.
verses.ct: then I will send rain on your land at the right time, both the early rain and the late rain, so you can harvest your grain, your wine, and your olive oil.

verses.kjv: And I will send grass in thy fields for thy cattle, that thou mayest eat and be full.
verses.ct: I will also provide grass in your fields for your livestock, and you will eat until you are satisfied.

verses.kjv: Take heed to yourselves, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and serve other gods, and worship them;
verses.ct: Be careful that your hearts are not led astray, causing you to turn away and worship other gods and bow down to them.

verses.kjv: And then the LORD’s wrath be kindled against you, and he shut up the heaven, that there be no rain, and that the land yield not her fruit; and lest ye perish quickly from off the good land which the LORD giveth you.
verses.ct: If you do, the LORD's anger will burn against you. He will close up the heaven so there is no rain, and the ground will not produce its crops, and you will quickly disappear from the good land the LORD is giving you.

verses.kjv: Therefore shall ye lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul, and bind them for a sign upon your hand, that they may be as frontlets between your eyes.
verses.ct: So store these words of mine deep in your heart and soul. Tie them as reminders on your hands, and wear them as symbols on your foreheads.

verses.kjv: And ye shall teach them your children, speaking of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
verses.ct: Teach them to your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road, when you lie down at night and when you get up in the morning.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt write them upon the door posts of thine house, and upon thy gates:
verses.ct: Write them on the doorframes of your houses and on your gates.

verses.kjv: That your days may be multiplied, and the days of your children, in the land which the LORD sware unto your fathers to give them, as the days of heaven upon the earth.
verses.ct: Then you and your children will enjoy long lives in the land that the LORD promised to give your ancestors — for as long as the heavens remain above the earth.

verses.kjv: For if ye shall diligently keep all these commandments which I command you, to do them, to love the LORD your God, to walk in all his ways, and to cleave unto him;
verses.ct: If you carefully follow every one of these commands I am giving you — loving the LORD your God, living according to all his ways, and holding tightly to him —

verses.kjv: Then will the LORD drive out all these nations from before you, and ye shall possess greater nations and mightier than yourselves.
verses.ct: then the LORD will force out all these nations ahead of you, and you will take over nations that are larger and more powerful than you are.

verses.kjv: Every place whereon the soles of your feet shall tread shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea shall your coast be.
verses.ct: Every place where you set foot will belong to you. Your territory will stretch from the wilderness to Lebanon, and from the Euphrates River all the way to the Mediterranean Sea.

verses.kjv: There shall no man be able to stand before you: for the LORD your God shall lay the fear of you and the dread of you upon all the land that ye shall tread upon, as he hath said unto you.
verses.ct: No one will be able to stand against you. The LORD your God will cause terror and dread of you to fall on everyone throughout the land wherever you go, just as he promised you.

verses.kjv: Behold, I set before you this day a blessing and a curse;
verses.ct: Pay attention — today I am placing in front of you a blessing and a curse.

verses.kjv: A blessing, if ye obey the commandments of the LORD your God, which I command you this day:
verses.ct: The blessing will come if you obey the commands of the LORD your God that I am giving you today.

verses.kjv: And a curse, if ye will not obey the commandments of the LORD your God, but turn aside out of the way which I command you this day, to go after other gods, which ye have not known.
verses.ct: The curse will come if you disobey the commands of the LORD your God and turn away from the path I am directing you on today by chasing after other gods you have never known.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, when the LORD thy God hath brought thee in unto the land whither thou goest to possess it, that thou shalt put the blessing upon mount Gerizim, and the curse upon mount Ebal.
verses.ct: When the LORD your God brings you into the land you are entering to possess, you are to pronounce the blessing from Mount Gerizim and the curse from Mount Ebal.

verses.kjv: Are they not on the other side Jordan, by the way where the sun goeth down, in the land of the Canaanites, which dwell in the champaign over against Gilgal, beside the plains of Moreh?
verses.ct: These mountains are across the Jordan, west of the road toward the setting sun, in the territory of the Canaanites who live in the plain opposite Gilgal, near the oaks of Moreh.

verses.kjv: For ye shall pass over Jordan to go in to possess the land which the LORD your God giveth you, and ye shall possess it, and dwell therein.
verses.ct: You are about to cross the Jordan to enter and take possession of the land the LORD your God is giving you. When you have taken it over and are living there,

verses.kjv: And ye shall observe to do all the statutes and judgments which I set before you this day.
verses.ct: make sure you carefully follow all the laws and regulations I am presenting to you today.
